comment: Three Coppers stabbed in North London last night. No description of the perpetrators, but I'm laying bets on names like Jemal, Leroy Winston, Mohammed....
amr:
# ::snt Three Coppers stabbed in North London last night. No description of the perpetrators, but I'm laying bets on names like Jemal, Leroy Winston, Mohammed....
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / stab-01
            :ARG1 (c / cop
                  :quant 3)
            :location (c2 / city-district
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "North"
                        :op2 "London"))
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (n2 / night)
                  :mod (y / yesterday)))
      :snt2 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (d2 / describe-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (p2 / perpetrate-01)))
            :ARG2 (b / bet-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG2 (n3 / name
                        :example (a / and
                              :op1 (p3 / person
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "Jemal"))
                              :op2 (p4 / person
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Leroy"
                                          :op2 "Winston"))
                              :op3 (p5 / person
                                    :name (n6 / name
                                          :op1 "Mohammed")))))))

comment: Hi There, Please refrain from using racist or sexist comments. They are hurtful and do not reflect the views of most people here. Thanks
amr:
# ::snt Hi There, Please refrain from using racist or sexist comments. They are hurtful and do not reflect the views of most people here. Thanks
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "There")))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (c / comment-01)
                        :mod (o / or
                              :op1 (r2 / racist)
                              :op2 (s2 / sexist))))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (h2 / hurt-01
                              :ARG0 (t2 / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (c3 / comment-01)))
                        :op2 (r3 / reflect-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 t2
                              :ARG2 (t3 / thing
                                    :ARG2-of (v / view-02
                                          :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                                :mod (m2 / most)
                                                :location (h3 / here)))))))))
